{{Infobox battle item |name = Lustrous Orb |image = [[File:Lustrous Orb.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Lustrous Orb''. |location =
*[[Spear Pillar]] }} == Description == The '''Lustrous Orb''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Palkia.png|30px]] Palkia. == Details == Raises attack of Palkia by 50%. == Acquisition == {{ItemPrice/headâ€Ž|Evolution items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Spear Pillar]]|[[Rare_Hold_Items|Rare Hold Item]] drop from Palkia''(Base 1/512 chance to drop)*''}} |} |} '''*Note:''' Using the [[Dowsing Machine]] increases the chances of obtaining Lustrous Orb to 1/341.
